PREFIX.description: paste your bot prefix note! Don't apply null prefix.

MODE.description: select your bot work type public-private-inbox-group.

ALIVE_IMG.description: paste your image url if you don't have you can use this public url.

LIVE_MSG.value: ğ‘»ğ‘¬ğ‘ªğ‘¯ğ‘ºğ’€ğ‘µğ‘ª-ğ‘´ğ‘« ğ‘°ğ‘º ğ‘¨ğ‘³ğ‘°ğ‘½ğ‘¬ ğ‘µğ‘¶ğ‘¾ ğ‘¨ğ‘µğ‘« ğ‘­ğ‘¶ğ‘¹ğ‘¬ğ‘½ğ‘¬ğ‘¹.âš¡

ALWAYS_ONLINE.description: Make it true if want always online.

AUTO_VOICE.description: Make it true if want automatic voice reply .

AUTO_REPLY.description: Make it true if you want automatic reply.

AUTO_STICKER.description: Make it true if you want automatic sticker.

AUTO_STATUS_SEEN.description: Make it true for automatic status seen.

AUTO_STATUS_REACT.description: make it true for automatic status reaction or like.

AUTO_STATUS_REPLY.description: Make it true for auto reply msg on status seen.

AUTO_STATUS_MSG.description: Type custom message on status reply
AUTO_STATUS_MSG.value: **ğ’€ğ‘¶ğ‘¼ğ‘¹ ğ‘ºğ‘»ğ‘¨ğ‘»ğ‘¼ğ‘º ğ‘¯ğ‘¨ğ‘º ğ‘©ğ‘¬ğ‘¬ğ‘µ ğ‘½ğ‘°ğ‘¬ğ‘¾ğ‘¬ğ‘« ğ‘±ğ‘¼ğ‘ºğ‘» ğ‘µğ‘¶ğ‘¾ ğ‘©ğ’€ ğ‘»ğ‘¬ğ‘ªğ‘¯ğ‘ºğ’€ğ‘µğ‘ª-ğ‘´ğ‘«-ğ‘©ğ‘¶ğ‘»*

OWNER_NUMBER.description: put the owner number for bot.

ANTI_LINK.description: Make it true if you want bot auto remove group link.

ANTI_BAD.description: Make it true if you want bot auto delete bad words.

DESCRIPTION.description: add caption for menu and other

DELETE_LINKS.description: remove links from group automatically without removing member

AUTO_RECORDING.description: Make it true if you want auto recoding.

AUTO_TYPING.description: Make it true if you want auto typing.

AUTO_REACT.description: Make it true if you want react on every message.

CUSTOM_REACT.description: Make it true if you want custom reactions.

CUSTOM_REACT_EMOJIS.description: put here custom react react emojis.

ANTI_DEL_PATH.description: change it to -same- if you want to resend deleted message in same chat

READ_MESSAGE.description: Make it true if you want bot read your all sms just now.
